name: Tornic
steps: Enter your text prompt in the input box and click Generate to generate your image.
Download generated images or generate more

faqs.q: Why use an AI image generator?
faqs.a: Coz its freakishly cool. Its what everyone is raving abour on twitter
It is trained on a dozen images and videos to generate images
It has different pricing options for everyone. From indiviuals just trying it out or design agency. It has Free option that has limitations. For the best service we recommend the paid options

faqs.q: Are there best practices on writing prompts?
faqs.a: The more descriptive you are the closer the AI is to generating the image you want. So we recommend getting more specific. A good example of a prompt is: Very cool girl wearing a cool stylish cyberpunk streetwear, 4k cinematic atmosphere in urban japan at night
